newInsertsQuery: SELECT cdc.movieId, cdc.title, cdc.genres from movies_cdc cdc left outer join movies_master master on (cdc.movieId = master.movieId) where master.movieId is null
updatedRecordsInsertsQuery: SELECT cdc.movieId, cdc.title, cdc.genres from movies_cdc cdc inner join movies_master master on (cdc.movieId = master.movieId)
updatedRecordsUpdatesQuery: SELECT master.movieId, master.title, master.genres from movies_cdc cdc inner join movies_master master on (cdc.movieId = master.movieId)
unchangedRecordsQuery: SELECT master.movieId, master.title, master.genres, master.status from movies_master master left join movies_cdc cdc on (cdc.movieId = master.movieId) where cdc.movieId is null
